Articles.Content:
﻿Basically, I play KSP, But when I go IVA, my pilot is glitched can someone please tell me how to fix this!?

[snip]

Greetings, Matt.

Edited September 29, 2018 by Vanamonde

The picture link is for a file on your computer, so the link will only work on your computer.

You will need to upload the picture to a file hosting site, then link the picture directly from there.  See the link in my signature for directions!

Welcome to the forum!  Hopefully once we see the picture, we can get you fixed up!

Hoi Nederlander, welkom op het forum.

Websites like Imgur are ideal for hosting your pictures.

Just drag and drop, click on the uploaded picture, copy the BBCode and paste it on the forum.

Hello and welcome to our forum,  Matt_ > I've removed your broken link and moved your post to the support subforum. Please provide a working link and people will be happy to try to help with your problem.
